body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for contacting Hayes Hospitality. My name is Vincent Hayes. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Carolyn. Can you please provide me with your date of birth in the format day, month, year?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's zero two, zero three, one nine eight zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. And can you also verify the last four digits of your phone number for security purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: The last four digits of my phone number are nine zero four five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing the information, Carolyn. Is there anything specific I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I just wanted to share my feedback on the food quality during my recent stay. I was quite happy with it.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: That's great to hear, Carolyn. I appreciate your feedback. Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Carolyn. If you have any more questions or feedback in the future, feel free to reach out. Have a wonderful day!
